OCC: how many tall is your bot?

Hecate/Sharpclaws/Deepfear/Underground/Charon::

Hecate and the Males looked each other and Sharpclaws answered him
"You're in Past Earth... And why is so importatn that we were 
Megatron or Blackarachnia....????"

All the males have ready their weapons and in Hecate's hands started 
emit energy... All Of them are ready to fight.

"Are you Allie of them????" said Sharpclaws 

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Robert Dahl <rdahl@s...> wrote:

> After the rocks are cleared by the preadacon giant and her allies, 
all that
> remains from the first war is scraps of metal lying everywhere, a 
red body
> that once used to belong to a predacon but is burnt beyond 
recognition.
> Lying close to it however is an intact body. Two large claws extend 
from
> one large piece of silver metalic body with orange legs sorounding 
it, and
> a tail with a stigner curled around the body. The hum from the 
computer

> 
> Computer: "Unit free of rocks, commencing reactivation..." with 
that the
> computer hum dies down, replaced with a groan from the body. It 
trys to
> stand up and right itself uncurling its legs from around its body. 
After it
> rights itself its eyes slowly open, but when it sees the robots 
surrounding
> it, it nervously starts clicking its pinshers and moves backward.
> 
> Strange Scorpion: " You're, you're not Megatron" it stammers weakly 
with a
> hint of worry. Looking at the giant female he stammers 
again, "youre not
> Blackaraknia" his claws start to click faster showing his worry and 
he
> starts to speak to no one in particular "where the slag am I, 
what's going
> on" then realizes he's surrounded again silences and the look of 
worry
